description: [REvil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0496) has used PowerShell to delete volume shadow copies and download files.(Citation: Secureworks GandCrab and REvil September 2019)(Citation: Talos Sodinokibi April 2019)(Citation: Intel 471 REvil March 2020)(Citation: Group IB Ransomware May 2020)

external_references.description: Secureworks . (2019, September 24). REvil: The GandCrab Connection. Retrieved August 4, 2020.
Cadieux, P, et al (2019, April 30). Sodinokibi ransomware exploits WebLogic Server vulnerability. Retrieved August 4, 2020.
Intel 471 Malware Intelligence team. (2020, March 31). REvil Ransomware-as-a-Service – An analysis of a ransomware affiliate operation. Retrieved August 4, 2020.
Group IB. (2020, May). Ransomware Uncovered: Attackers’ Latest Methods. Retrieved August 5, 2020.
